title: Ethereum can hit $3500, but only on this condition - AMBCrypto English
summary: Ethereum (ETH) could reach $3,500 if it sustains a weekly close above $2,150, according to crypto technical analyst Ali Martinez. The momentum could be stemmed if traders decide to lock in gains, with all holders standing to gain 7.73% if they sell their holdings at the prevailing price. The upswing is attributed to strong expectations of interest rate cuts by the Federal Reserve in 2024 and the enthusiasm around spot exchange-traded funds (ETFs). However, the $1,900-$2,100 range is seen as a key area for purchasing, with 5.85 million addresses buying 43.8 million ETH in this range.

title: Safe wants Ethereum users to create wallets with emails — not seed phrases - Blockworks
summary: Safe, a smart contract wallet, has partnered with Web3Auth to create SafeAuth, a tool that allows users to create wallets using their emails instead of lengthy seed phrases. This new method aims to improve the user experience and increase adoption of smart accounts, which were introduced via the ERC-4337 standard to improve the general Ethereum user experience through more intuitive and customizable crypto wallets. However, adoption has been slow, with only 1% of smart wallets using ERC-4337 retaining users after five weeks. Despite this, Safe has seen a 201% increase in monthly average users, suggesting growing interest in smart accounts. SafeAuth offers a unified access method for multiple blockchain applications and can assist in increasing adoption of smart account standards.

title: Societe Generale issues its first green bond on Ethereum - Cointelegraph
summary: Societe Generale, a French bank, has issued its first digital green bond on the Ethereum blockchain. The bond has a value of 10 million euros and a maturity of three years, and its net proceeds will be used to finance or refinance green activities. The bond's smart contract provides 24/7 access to its carbon footprint data, and investors can settle securities on-chain through a euro-pegged stablecoin. Societe Generale has been active in the crypto sector, issuing bonds on the Ethereum and Tezos blockchains, and proposing Dai stablecoin loans.

summary: Ryan Sean Adams, a crypto investor, believes that Ethereum (ETH) is undervalued at its current price of around $2,200. Uniswap founder Hayden Adams agrees that Ethereum's fundamentals will drive appreciation, but notes that the coin's strength comes from active protocols launching on the mainnet rather than speculation. Ultra Sound Money reports that Uniswap has burned over 14,900 ETH in the past month, making the network more deflationary.

title: There is a 25% probability of Solana flipping Ethereum: Santiago Santos - FXStreet

He believes that Solana's market capitalization could exceed Ethereum's due to higher capital inflows and a larger share for Solana funds. Solana's market cap is currently $25.51 billion, while Ethereum's is $274.51 billion. Santos argues that capital rotation from Ethereum to Solana could drive the change, without necessarily requiring an increase in the overall crypto market capitalization. He has entertained the idea of selling his Ether and buying Solana tokens.

title: Hashdex tips spot Bitcoin ETFs to trade by Q2, followed by Ethereum - Cointelegraph
summary: Hashdex, a crypto asset manager, expects a spot Bitcoin ETF to launch in the US by Q2 2024, followed by an Ethereum ETF. The company believes that legacy asset managers will enter the crypto market with spot ETFs, unlocking a $50 trillion market. However, the approval process for ETFs is complex and may take weeks or even months, according to industry experts.

title: SEC pushes deadline to decide on Grayscale spot Ether ETF - Cointelegraph
summary:
Sure, here's a summary of the article in less than 256 tokens:

The SEC has delayed its decision on Grayscale's spot Ether ETF, giving itself more time to consider the proposed rule change. The deadline for approval or disapproval has been set for January 25, 2024. This is the first time the SEC has been ordered to review a proposed rule change since an appellate court ruled in favor of Grayscale's Bitcoin ETF offering. The SEC has yet to approve a spot BTC or ETH exchange-traded fund for listing on a U.S. exchange, but has approved investment vehicles tied to crypto futures.

title: NFT Trading Activity on Ethereum Surges, Reaching a Six-Month High - Unchained - Unchained
summary: NFT trading activity on the Ethereum blockchain has surged to a six-month high, with total trading volume reaching over 105,000 ETH in the past week. This represents a 250% increase since mid-October and could indicate an end to the NFT winter. Key drivers of the resurgence include renewed interest in "meme" NFTs like Pixelmon and Milady, as well as the breakout of NFTs into the broader culture, with examples like Pudgy Penguins debuting in 2,000 Walmart stores in the US. The majority of NFT trading volume now takes place on Blur, the leading marketplace for high-frequency traders.

title: Raoul Pal Compares Solana and Ethereum, Tron Price Prediction and Everlodge Outlook - CryptoPotato

Tron's price forecast is bullish, and Everlodge is revolutionizing the real estate sector with AI monitoring technology. The Everlodge token (ELDG) has potential for growth, but readers are advised to do their own research and consult a professional before investing.

title: Societe Generale Pioneers Digital Green Bond on Ethereum Blockchain - The Tokenizer
summary: Societe Generale has issued its first digital green bond on the Ethereum blockchain, worth €10 million. The bond is a security token, fully subscribed by two institutional investors, and will fund or refinance eligible green activities. The digital format provides increased transparency and traceability, and investors can settle securities on-chain through the EUR CoinVertible. This issuance demonstrates Societe Generale's commitment to integrating blockchain for enhanced ESG data and showcases the group's debt capital markets capabilities.

title: Ethereum NFT Creators Scramble to Secure Projects From Thirdweb Vulnerability - Decrypt
summary: Thirdweb, a popular crypto development platform, disclosed a security vulnerability in a widely used open-source library for Web3 smart contracts, affecting many Ethereum NFT projects. The vulnerability is tied to NFT smart contracts using the ERC-721 and ERC-1155 standards, as well as fungible tokens minted via the ERC-20 standard. Thirdweb recommends that affected projects undertake a mitigation process, including locking down current smart contracts and airdropping tokens to current holders. The company will cover network fees associated with migrating holders from affected smart contracts. Major industry players, such as OpenSea and Rarible, have weighed in on the issue and are working with Thirdweb to assist affected NFT holders.

title: Institutional Funds to Ethereum Products Flip Green as ETH Trades Above $2,200 - Cryptonews
summary: Institutional investors are showing renewed interest in Ethereum (ETH) products, with inflows totaling $10 million year-to-date (YTD) after several weeks of outflows. This shift in sentiment is despite the asset's poor performance in 2022, which saw it plunge over 55% alongside Bitcoin (BTC). The recent surge in ETH's price can be attributed to the network's Merge, which transitioned its consensus mechanism to Proof-of-Stake, as well as increased optimism from wealth managers who back the asset as having the highest growth potential. Inflows into ETH products have totaled $31 million in the past five weeks, outshining Solana (SOL) and igniting bullish sentiments in the market.

title: OKX Ventures Joins Ethereum Climate Platform As a Launch Partner to Advance Sustainability in Web3 - OKX
summary: OKX Ventures, the investment arm of OKX, has joined the Ethereum Climate Platform (ECP) as a launch partner to promote sustainability in the Web3 ecosystem. The platform aims to reduce Ethereum's carbon emissions since its launch in 2015 and galvanize climate solutions with Web3 innovation. OKX Ventures' participation sets a new standard for environmentally conscious blockchain advancement in the Web3 space and aligns with its vision of an open, equitable, and sustainable future of Web3.

title: Bitcoin Transaction Fees Outpace Ethereum, DeFi TVL Surges 11% in November: Binance - Cryptonews
summary:
Sure, here's a summary of the article in less than 256 tokens:

Bitcoin transaction fees surpassed Ethereum's in November, marking a deviation from the usual pattern. DeFi volumes also saw an 11% increase, with Solana and Chainlink being the top-performing assets. The overall digital asset market grew by 11% in November, with a 200% growth in NFT volumes. Institutional funds are flowing into digital asset products, with Solana being a favorite among institutional investors.

title: SEC Postpones Ruling on Grayscale Ethereum ETF - Crypto Times
summary:
SEC Delays Ruling on Grayscale Ethereum ETF, Citing Complexities and Potential Repercussions.

The US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has postponed its decision on Grayscale's proposal for a spot in the Ethereum exchange-traded fund (ETF), targeting January 25, 2024, for a final verdict. This development follows an appellate court's direction to reevaluate Grayscale's Bitcoin ETF proposal earlier in October. The SEC's cautious approach underscores the potential repercussions of the decision on the cryptocurrency market, with a positive outcome expected to pave the way for broader institutional participation and mainstream acceptance of Ethereum, while a negative outcome could significantly affect market confidence and investor sentiment.

title: Binance looks to boost FDUSD adoption with fee-free trading for Ethereum, XRP, others - CryptoSlate
summary: Binance is offering fee-free trading for six digital assets, including Ethereum and XRP, in an effort to boost the adoption of the First Digital USD (FDUSD) stablecoin. The promotion starts on December 8 and excludes these pairs from BNB fee discounts and other adjustments. Binance has been pushing FDUSD as a viable alternative to the now-defunct Binance USD (BUSD) stablecoin, which faced regulatory issues. Despite its lower circulating supply, Binance is incentivizing the use of FDUSD through new products and promotions.

title: Societe Generale Issues First Digital Green Bond as Security Token on Ethereum Blockchain - Cryptonews
summary: Societe Generale, a French bank, has issued its first digital green bond on the Ethereum blockchain, worth €10 million. This bond is the first to be issued as a security token and marks a significant milestone for the bank. The bond is dedicated to financing or refinancing green activities and will be settled on-chain using the EUR CoinVertible stablecoin. The issuance of this bond is part of the bank's commitment to environmentally responsible financing and leverages the transparency and traceability of blockchain technology. Societe Generale has been an active participant in the cryptocurrency space and has previously issued Eurobonds on the Ethereum blockchain and security tokens on the Tezos blockchain.

title: Ethereum Price Prediction for December 2023 - Can ETH Reach $2500 Before 2024? - Analytics Insight
summary: Ethereum ($ETH) price prediction for December 2023 is uncertain, with some predicting a maximum value of $2,232 while others warn of a potential drop to around $2,000. Other coins, such as Bitcoin ETF Token ($BTCETF), Bitcoin Minetrix ($BTCMTX), Meme Kombat ($MK), and T.G. Casino ($TGC), are gaining popularity among investors due to their high growth potential. These coins are predicted to explode in value more than Ethereum, with some predicting gains of up to 100x.

title: Ethereum DEX Matcha Aims to Make It Easier to Trade Assets Across Chains - Decrypt
summary: Matcha, an Ethereum DEX aggregator, has launched cross chain swaps, allowing users to trade tokens across different Ethereum-compatible networks with ease. This new feature simplifies the process of moving assets between chains, making it more convenient for traders who juggle multiple chains. Matcha aggregates liquidity from various exchanges and provides the best prices for trades, and its cross chain swaps use battle-tested official bridges for security. The feature is free to use, and it eliminates the need for users to juggle different websites, swap platforms, or open multiple browser tabs. Other options for moving assets across chains include aggregators, in-wallet transfers, traditional bridges, and centralized exchanges, but Matcha's cross chain swaps offer a more streamlined and secure experience.

title: Societe Generale Embraces Blockchain with Green Bond Issuance - CoinGape
summary: Societe Generale, a French banking giant, has issued green bonds on the Ethereum network, marking a shift in traditional finance's approach to blockchain technology. This move highlights the growing interest among mainstream financial institutions in the potential of blockchain for enhancing transparency, efficiency, and sustainability in financial transactions. The issuance of digital green bond tokens represents a growing trend in the finance industry, with other institutions such as JPMorgan and Apollo exploring blockchain-based solutions. The use of blockchain technology allows for enhanced transparency and traceability, as well as faster transaction and settlement processes. The success of this initiative could pave the way for the integration of blockchain technology in mainstream financial operations, potentially revolutionizing how we perceive and interact with financial assets.

title: Societe Generale to introduce a green bond on Ethereum - The Financial Express
summary: Societe Generale, a French bank, has issued its first digital green bond on the Ethereum blockchain. The bond, worth 10 million euros, will be used to finance green activities and has a maturity of three years. This is the first time a major bank has issued a bond on a public blockchain, demonstrating the capabilities of Societe Generale's subsidiary, SG-FORGE, in providing on-chain services. The bond will also allow investors to settle securities on-chain through a euro-pegged stablecoin issued by Forge in April 2023.
